readable.title: 3549614763_42f34f3d1e
readable.content: There are two girls sitting at a table reading menus while the waiter stands at the table . Two girls look at a menu with unhappy faces as the waiter takes their orders . Two girls sit at a table outdoors and give their order to the waiter . two women looking at menus with waiter at table Two young women sitting at an outdoor resaurant looking at menus about to place their order with the waiter standing at their table .
